cause.description:
Racism has plagued the world from the start. Now it's time to change. Think of what will be better for the world not what you think of others.
1. Don't judge by color or ethnicity.
2. We can all be equal.
3. Don't judge by sex either.
cause.mission: Show that all men AND women of ALL RACES are EQUAL!!!!
cause.name: Stop Racism
